channel.title: Compile.bat... help
channel.description:
hey im making a privite server and ever time i press compile.bat it comes up and says
'javac' is not recognized as an internal or extrenal command, operable or batch file. press any key to continue...
i have all the java stuff and i tryed different codes and most say same thing can anyone help me?

item.title: Compile.bat... help
item.dc:creator: @gman035t gman035t
item.description:

Ehm, you have java jdk installed righ?

Read full topic
